job.title: Tesla Recharge "Returnship" Program - Software Engineer, Back End
job.description: ltstronggtRoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTeslas Recharge Program is your pathway to returning to a fulltime career after a career break of more than a year During our 18week program you will refresh your existing skill sets and learn new technologies with supportive mentors by your side We foster professional growth in a structured environment through a combination of training and handson projects You will be empowered to take on new challenges that will allow you to reclaim both your skills and confidence in the workplaceltbrgtltbrgtAre you ready to Recharge you careerltbrgtltbrgtAs a Software Engineer youll take part in the design and development of software for the current and next generation of Teslas Enterprise Resource Planning systems Digital Experience Manufacturing and Service SoftwareltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork with experienced engineers across many functional areas to deliver business value to internal and external stakeholdersltligtltligtDesign and Develop scalable applications using tools like C NET Golang MySQL and other open stack frameworksltligtltligtSeek to understand all aspects business and technical of the applications on which you work so that you can be most effectiveltligtltligtContribute towards the timely completion of development tasks and small projects while applying company standardsltligtltligtContinually learn and apply relevant software development practices patterns tools and technologiesltligtltligtIncrease efficiency reduce waste wherever and whenever possibleltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMust be returning from a recent career gap of at least 1 yearltligtltligt2 years of experience in web application development including Implementing Application Programming Interfaces APIs Object Oriented Programming and Design OOPampampD Object Relational Mapping ORMltligtltligtExperience in backend development using tools such as C Java Go Ruby Python etcltligtltligtRelational databases SQL NoSQLltligtltligtAgile DevelopmentltligtltligtDistributed Source Control using tools such as GitltligtltligtBSMS in Computer Science or equivalent degreeltligtltulgt
